summary: ADDS SEVERAL FOLLOWERS FROM THE CONAN FANTASY WORLD TO SKYRIM
descriptionHtml:
SINCE I\'VE BEEN PLAYING MY CHARACTER HAS CONAN THE BARBARIAN AND THERE ARE SEVERAL FOLLOWER MODS OUT THERE BUT NONE OF THEM ADDS FOLLOWERS FROM THE CONAN WORLD I DICIDED TO MAKE SOME OF THEM FOR MYSELF TO BETTER ENJOY THE GAME.
NOW I\'VE DICIDED TO SHARE THEM WITH ALL THE OTHER CONAN AND SKYRIM FANS.
I HOPE YOU ENJOY IT HAS MUCH HAS I AM.
THEY ARE ALL AROUND THE INN\'S AND TAVERNS OF SKYRIM. TRY TO THINK ABOUT THE CHARACTERS AND WHERE THEY WOULD BE. 
JUST INSTALL THE FILES IN YOUR SKYRIM DATA FOLDER AND SELECT THEM IN TES MOD MANAGER OR IN THE SKYRIM DATA FILES MENU.
author: SERGEYNEST
